bibl.title: The Apocryphal Acts of the Apostles on Papyrus: Revisiting the Question of Readership and Audience.

series.title: Texts and Editions for New Testament Study.

bibl.note: Examine en part.: P. Bodmer X (= van Haelst 611); P. Oxy. VI, 849 (= van Haelst 603); P. Oxy. VI, 850 (= van Haelst 604); P. Fackelmann 3 [ed.: Michael GRONEWALD, Einige Fackelmann-Papyri, ZPE 28 (1978) pp. 274-276 et pl. XIX]; P. Ant. I, 13 (= van Haelst 610).

bibl.title: New Testament Manuscripts. Their Texts and Their World

bibl.seg: HAINES-EITZEN Kim, The Apocryphal Acts of the Apostles on Papyrus: Revisiting the Question of Readership and Audience.
Thomas J. KRAUS and Tobias NICKLAS (Edd.), New Testament Manuscripts. Their Texts and Their World = Texts and Editions for New Testament Study. 2 (Leiden - Boston, 2006) pp. 293-304.

Examine en part.: P. Bodmer X (= van Haelst 611); P. Oxy. VI, 849 (= van Haelst 603); P. Oxy. VI, 850 (= van Haelst 604); P. Fackelmann 3 [ed.: Michael GRONEWALD, Einige Fackelmann-Papyri, ZPE 28 (1978) pp. 274-276 et pl. XIX]; P. Ant. I, 13 (= van Haelst 610).
